definition: The term refers to the atmospheric phenomenon that occurs during a specific time of day, typically after sunset. It describes the visual appearance of the sky during this time, specifically focusing on the celestial dome. It is commonly used to depict the colorful and picturesque scenery that can be observed during this period, often associated with tranquility and beauty.

examples.german: Der Abendhimmel leuchtete in den schönsten Farben.
examples.english: The evening sky was glowing in the most beautiful colors.

examples.german: Der Abendhimmel war von Wolken bedeckt.
examples.english: The evening sky was covered with clouds.

examples.german: Der Abendhimmel bot einen atemberaubenden Anblick.
examples.english: The evening sky offered a breathtaking view.

examples.german: Der Abendhimmel verfärbte sich langsam von Blau zu Orange.
examples.english: The evening sky slowly changed color from blue to orange.

examples.german: Der Abendhimmel war mit Sternen übersät.
examples.english: The evening sky was studded with stars.
